- FLOW.from sentence: Here we briefly describe the ablated systems : " - FLOW " removes the flow component from IF layer ( Eq. 2 in Section 3.2 ) , " - QHIER - RNN " removes the hierarchical LSTM layers on final question vectors ( Eq. 7 in Section 3.3 ) .
